content: युज् {vI.v} {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> (युनक्ति, युंक्ते, युयोज, युयुजे, अयुजत्, अयौक्षीत्, अयुक्त, योक्ष्यति-ते, योक्तुं, युक्त) {@--1@} To join, unite, attach, connect. add; तमर्थमिव भारत्या सुतया योक्तुमर्हसि <ls>Ku. 6. 79</ls>; see {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} below. {@--2@} To yoke, harness, put to; भानुः सकृद्युक्ततुरंग एव <ls>Ś. 5. 4</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 14.</ls> {@--3@} To furnish or endow with; as in गुणयुक्त. {@--4@} To use, employ, apply; प्रशस्ते कर्मणि तथा सच्छब्दः पार्थ युज्यते <ls>Bg. 17. 26</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 204.</ls> {@--5@} To appoint, set (with <ab>loc.</ab>). {@--6@} To direct, turn or fix upon (as the mind &c.). {@--7@} To concentrate one's attention upon; मनः संयम्य मच्चित्तो युक्त आसीत मत्परः <ls>Bg. 6. 14</ls>; युंजन्नेवं सदात्मानं <ls n="Bg. 6.">15.</ls> {@--8@} To put, place or fix on (with <ab>loc.</ab>). {@--9@} To prepare, arrange, make ready, fit. {@--10@} To give, bestow, confer; आशिषं युयुजे. {@--11@} To adhere or cleave to. {@--12@} To enjoin, charge. {@--13@} To put in, insert. {@--14@} To think or medita to upon. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} (युज्यते) {@--1@} To be joined or united with; रविपीतजला तपात्यये पुनरोघेन हि युज्यते नदी <ls>Ku. 4. 44</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 17.</ls> {@--2@} To get, be possessed of; इष्टैर्युज्येथां <ls>Mv. 7</ls>; इष्टेन युज्यस्व <ls>Ś. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 65.</ls> {@--3@} To be fit or right, be proper, to suit (with <ab>loc.</ab> or <ab>gen.</ab>); या यस्य युज्यते भूमिका तां खलु भावेन तथैव सर्वे वर्ग्याः पाठिताः <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; त्रैलोक्यस्यापि प्रभुत्वं त्वयि युज्यते <ls>H. 1.</ls> {@--4@} To be ready for; तता युद्धाय युज्यस्व <ls>Bg. 2. 38</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 2.">50.</ls> {@--5@} To be intent on, be absorbed in, be directed towards; <ls>Ms. 3. 75</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">14. 35</ls>; <ls>Ki. 7. 13.</ls> {@--6@} To be fastened or harnessed. {@--7@} To adhere, to be in close contact. {@--8@} To attain to, possess, obtain. {@--9@} To be made ready. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (योजयति-ते) {@--1@} To join, unite, bring together; परस्परेण स्पृहणीयशोभं न चेदिदं द्वंद्वमयोजयिष्यत् <ls>R. 7. 14.</ls> {@--2@} To present, give, bestow; <ls>R. 10. 56.</ls> {@--3@} To appoint, employ, use; शत्रुभिर्योजयिच्छत्रुं <ls>Pt. 4. 17.</ls> {@--4@} To turn or direct towards; पापान्निवारयति योजयते हिताय <ls>Bh. 2. 72.</ls> {@--5@} To excite, urge, instigate. {@--6@} To perform, achieve. {@--7@} To prepare, arrange, equip. {@--8@} To yoke, harness. {@--9@} To apply, fix, set, place. {@--10@} To furnish or endow with. {@--11@} To surround. {@--12@} To despise, think lightly of. {@--13@} To appoint to. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (युयुक्षति-ते) To wish to join, yoke, give &c. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (यीजति, योजयति-ते) To unite, join, yoke &c.; see युज् above. {vIII.v} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (युज्यते) To concentrate the mind (identical with the {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} of युज् I). {vIV.v} {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> (योजयते) To censure.

युज् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--1@} Joined or united with, yoked, drawn by &c. {@--2@} Furnished or filled with, possessed of. {@--3@} Exciting, setting on. {@--4@} Even, not odd. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A joiner, one who unites or joins. {@--2@} A sage, one who devotes himself to abstract meditation. {@--3@} A pair, couple ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also in this sense). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} dual. {@--1@} The sign {%Gemimi%} of the zodiac. {@--2@} The two Aśvins.
